response.original_title: Mr. Laughs: A Look Behind the Curtain
response.overview: Acclaimed actor Vincent D'Onofrio narrates this documentary that celebrates the life and career of renowned comedian Sal Richards, from his upbringing in Brooklyn, N.Y., to his days headlining shows in glittering Las Vegas. Featuring interviews with Richards and highlights from his standup routines, director Greg Principato's entertaining film also includes Don Rickles, Joy Behar and other veteran comics reflecting on Richards's show-biz legacy.
response.title: Mr. Laughs: A Look Behind the Curtain
